field.name: summary
field.value: New Prototype library 1.5.0_rc1 causes Ajax Observers to fail

field.name: description
field.value:
The new prototype library 1.5.0_rc1cause Ajax objserver to fail with a javascript exception "element.tagName has no value".
Observer script : <script type="text/javascript">new Form.Element.Observer('employe.TitreEmploiNonSyndique.id', 2, function(element, value) { new Ajax.Updater('CodePayeCegeModifie', '/Ajax/ObtenirCodeDePayeCege.rails', {asynchronous:true, evalScripts:true, parameters:'titreEmploiNonSyndiqueGuid='+value}) })</script>
When I revert back to the old library 1.3.1, the observer then works fine.
